normalized_lines: Toss onion, peppers, zucchini, beans, oil, and spices on a sheet pan.
Roast 20 to 25 minutes, stirring once halfway.
Fill tortillas with roasted veggies and beans.
Chef note - add crumbled feta if desired.
This post may contain affiliate links.

target_recipe.title: SHEET PAN VEGGIE TACOS
steps: Toss onion, peppers, zucchini, beans, oil, and spices on a sheet pan.
Roast 20 to 25 minutes, stirring once halfway.
Fill tortillas with roasted veggies and beans.
notes: Chef note - add crumbled feta if desired.
